definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: My project has benefited from this happenstance.
sentences.chinese: 我的计划从这种偶然性里获益良多。

sentences.english: Just by happenstance I revisited Aubergine Bistro earlier this year.
sentences.chinese: 只是我的偶然性重新茄子酒馆今年早些时候。

sentences.english: The reason for the accidental failure lies in the unduely designed inlet pipe to the tank.
sentences.chinese: 而油罐进油管设计欠合理则是造成偶然性失效的原因。

sentences.english: Sorry, the number you dail is power off please call it later.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，偶然性拔叫的用户已关机，请稍后再拔。

sentences.english: The banana peels have been replaced with something like inevitability.
sentences.chinese: 偶然性的“香蕉皮”被转化成了某种必然性。

sentences.english: The social process is the unity of necessity and contigency.
sentences.chinese: 社会过程是必然性与偶然性的统一。

sentences.english: I am breaking even and getting some marketing in China.
sentences.chinese: 我正在劲力打破这种偶然性，大规模进军中国市场。

sentences.english: It seems that pollination also involves certain chance factors.
sentences.chinese: 但稻作东传也不能排除其偶然性因素。

sentences.english: The official cause of death was eventually ruled to be accidental asphyxiation.
sentences.chinese: 最后，法定死因为偶然性窒息死亡。

sentences.english: Gifts of books and journals can often be quite fortuitous .
sentences.chinese: 图书和期刊的赠阅可能往往带有相当的偶然性。

sentences.english: Divine Providence does not exclude evil, contingency, free will, chance or luck.
sentences.chinese: 神意并不排除罪恶，偶然性，自由意志，机会和幸运。

sentences.english: Subject to the "fortuity principle", the event must be uncertain.
sentences.chinese: 依据偶然性原则，该事件必须是不确定的。
